title: Midsommar
plot: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

title: Hereditary
plot: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

title: CODA
plot: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her passion at Berklee College of Music and her fear of a

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

title: The Lighthouse
plot: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.

title: The Witch
plot: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

title: No Country for Old Men
plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: A Clockwork Orange
plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

title: The Gentlemen
plot: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

title: Color Out of Space
plot: A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world.

title: Mandy
plot: The enchanted lives of a couple in a secluded forest are brutally shattered by a nightmarish hippie cult and their demon-biker henchmen, propelling a man into a spiraling, surreal rampage of vengeance.

title: The Lobster
plot: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into beasts and sent off into The Woods.

title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
plot: Steven, a charismatic surgeon, is forced to make an unthinkable sacrifice after his life starts to fall apart, when the behavior of a teenage boy he has taken under his wing turns sinister.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
plot: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnar√∂k, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.
